name: Tadej's Criss-cross Tempo
description:
Train Like Tadej for the Giro-Tour Double with Criss-cross Tempo. This is a challenging session that tests both your aerobic and anaerobic energy systems. Criss-cross Tempo is a great session that simulates the demands of racing by forcing you to recover at a high power output. This session consists of 2x8min Criss-cross Tempo (1min at 95% FTP followed by 3min at 80% FTP) with 4min recovery.
